backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a product-name display requirement to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including components, data, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing cart state, product navigation, hero section, and layout.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays full product info with image, price, description, fallback name, and add-to-cart action.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Renders grid of product cards with image, description, price, and actions for details and adding to cart.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header showing site title and cart count with icon.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Exports Product interface and a seeded list of five sports products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes plus global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theme settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and requirements for a Sports Shop web app.
